author: jaylawhorn
body:
This PR adds a debugging class and corresponding analyzer for Mahi. Has no impact on standard reconstruction chain(s) in my local tests.

Saves the following debugging information: 
- Event number (evt), luminosity section (ls), run number (run), and bunch crossing within in bunch train (nBxTrain). 
- Channel location (ieta, iphi, depth). 
- Number of time slices digitized (nSamples) and bunch crossing of interest (soi).
- The time constraint used for the Mahi pulse fit (inTimeConst), average pedestal (inPedAvg), and channel gain (inGain)
- Per each time slice: ADC digitization noise (inNoiseADC), photostatistics uncertainty (inNoisePhoto), and pedestal width (inPedestal), and sum in quadrature of these 3 uncorrelated uncertainty sources.
- The final mahiEnergy, chiSq, arrivalTime, and if three pulse Mahi fit was used (use3)
- The Mahi fit result for SOI-1 "previous" charge (pEnergy), SOI+1 "next" charge (nEnergy), and pedestal charge (pedEnergy)
- Input digi charges (inputTS) and TDC values (inputTDC)
- Fitted pulses: itPulse, pPulse, and nPulse
title: [HCAL] HBHE Local reconstruction Mahi debugger
